products.title: Fortnite (FOR ALL CONSOLES)
products.description: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017.

products.title: Call Of Duty: Warzone (FOR ALL CONSOLES)
products.description: Call of Duty: Warzone is a free-to-play battle royale video game released on March 10, 2020, for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Microsoft Windows.

products.title: Apex Legends (FOR ALL CONSOLES)
products.description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale-hero shooter game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts.

products.title: PUBG (FOR ALL CONSOLES)
products.description: Land on strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies, and survive to become the last team standing across various, diverse Battlegrounds.

products.title: Grand Theft Auto V
products.description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games.

products.title: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet Switch
products.description: Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet are upcoming 2022 role-playing video games developed by Game Freak and published by Nintendo and The Pokémon Company for the Nintendo Switch.

products.title: Diablo III
products.description: Diablo III is a hack-and-slash action role-playing game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment as the third installment in the Diablo franchise.

products.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
products.description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is a 2018 action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. The game is the third entry in the Red Dead series and a prequel to the 2010 game Red Dead Redemption.

products.title: Fifa 22
products.description: FIFA 22 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts. It is the 29th installment in the FIFA series, and was released worldwide on 1 October 2021.
